table.name: gtm_tr_line_percentage_value
table.description: A generic key/value representation to capture all possible percentage information.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_PERCENTAGE_VALUE_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The GID for the percentage value qualifier associated with the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: PERCENTAGE_VALUE
columns.description: The percentage value associated with the GTM trade transaction line.
